CONTACT_HAS_ACTIVE_CONTRACT.message: Contact is still in use by an active contract

CONTACT_HAS_ACTIVE_SUBSCRIBER.message: Contact is still in use by an active subscriber

CONTACT_IS_CUSTOMER_CONTACT.message: reseller_id not allowed on system contact

RESELLER_NAME_EXISTS.message: invalid 'name', reseller with name '{name}' already exists

RESELLER_CHANGE_UNASSOCIATED_FORBIDDEN.message: Updating item not associated with a reseller is not allowed

RESELLER_CONTRACT_EXISTS.message: invalid 'contract_id', reseller with contract already exists

CONTACT_CONTRACT_INVALID_LINK.message: Invalid 'contract_id', linking to a customer contact

DOMAIN_DOES_NOT_BELONG_TO_RESELLER.message: domain does not belong to reseller

CHANGE_ID_FORBIDDEN.message: Changing the reseller ID is not allowed

RESELLER_SET_ID_FORBIDDEN.message: Cannot set the reseller Id if it was unset before

RESELLER_INVALID_ID.message: Reseller ID other than the user"s reseller ID is not allowed

RESELLER_UNDEFINED_ID.message: Undefined reseller ID is not allowed

RESELLER_CREATE_INVALID_ASSOCIATION.message: Creating items associated with a reseller is allowed for admin and reseller users only

RESELLER_UPDATE_INVALID_ASSOCIATION.message: Updating items associated with a reseller is allowed for admin and reseller users only

INVALID_SYSTEM_CONTACT.message: The contact_id is not a valid ngcp:systemcontacts item, but an ngcp:customercontacts item
